metadata.Title: CVE-2022-38013 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description:
.NET Core and Visual Studio Denial of Service Vulnerability.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-38013` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

aspnetcore-runtime-6.0 - 6.0.109-0ubuntu1~22.04.1
aspnetcore-targeting-pack-6.0 - 6.0.109-0ubuntu1~22.04.1
dotnet-apphost-pack-6.0 - 6.0.109-0ubuntu1~22.04.1
dotnet-host - 6.0.109-0ubuntu1~22.04.1
dotnet-hostfxr-6.0 - 6.0.109-0ubuntu1~22.04.1
dotnet-runtime-6.0 - 6.0.109-0ubuntu1~22.04.1
dotnet-sdk-6.0 - 6.0.109-0ubuntu1~22.04.1
dotnet-sdk-6.0-source-built-artifacts - 6.0.109-0ubuntu1~22.04.1
dotnet-targeting-pack-6.0 - 6.0.109-0ubuntu1~22.04.1
dotnet-templates-6.0 - 6.0.109-0ubuntu1~22.04.1
dotnet6 - 6.0.109-0ubuntu1~22.04.1
netstandard-targeting-pack-2.1 - 6.0.109-0ubuntu1~22.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: dotnet6 package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.0.109-0ubuntu1~22.04.1').
